        number - the booking number

      • checkOut

        public boolean checkOut(java.lang.String customerName,
                        java.time.LocalDate checkIn,
                        java.time.LocalDate checkOut,
                        int number)
        Checks users out of the hotel
        Parameters:
        customerName - the name of the customer who made the reservation
        checkIn - the check in date
        checkOut - the checkout date
        number - the booking number
        Returns:
        whether the check out was successful, false if the reservation doesn't exist or it's not even checked in
